Package riskgame.model.Utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackProcess
    This class processes the attack checks that how many dice can be tron and how many dice user want to throw checks if defender wins or attacker checks if country,continent or whole map is conquered or not
    InfoRetriver
    This class includes methods for processing and organizing different type of data required for display in ListView
    InitPlayers
    This class includes methods for initlizing all players and allocating countries to each player randomly
    InitWorldMap  
    ListviewRenderer
    This class includes methods for rendering itmes displayed in ListViews
    LoadGame  
    MapChecker
    Map checker examines the map format before display it.
    RobotGamingProcess
    This class process multithreading of tournament mode games.
    SaveProgress
    save game class
